title: Protection (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020.
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Employment Affairs and Social
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Employment Affairs and Social 
Protection (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 21 October 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited employment affair social protection (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (2) order come operation 21 october 2020

title: Protection (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020.
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Gnóthaí Fostaíochta agus Coimirce Sóisialaí and, 
in the English language, the Department of Employment Affairs and Social 
Protection, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí 
and, in the English language, to that of the Department of Social Protection.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn gnothai fostaiochta agus coimirce soisialai english language department employment affair social protection altered irish language roinn coimirce soisialai english language department social protection

title: Protection (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020.
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Gnóthaí Fostaíochta agus Coimirce 
Sóisialaí and, in the English language, the Minister for Employment Affairs and 
Social Protection, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an tAire Coimirce 
Sóisialaí and, in the English language, to that of the Minister for Social 
Protection.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire gnothai fostaiochta agus coimirce soisialai english language minister employment affair social protection altered irish language taire coimirce soisialai english language minister social protection

title: Protection (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020.
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment -
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment - 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Employment Affairs and Social 
Protection shall be construed as references to the Department of 
Social Protection; 

references to the Minister for Employment Affairs and Social 
Protection shall be construed as references to the Minister for 
Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [447] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

20 October, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
